tool_description: URL Shortener is a Node.js-based backend project that provides a simple and efficient way to shorten URLs and track click analytics. It offers a RESTful API for creating, managing, and accessing shortened URLs.
name: URLShortener
title: URLShortener

api_list.name: /api/urlShort/shorten
api_list.description: Shortens a long URL and returns the shortened URL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://urlshortener2.p.rapidapi.com/api/urlShort/shorten"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "urlshortener2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://urlshortener2.p.rapidapi.com/api/urlShort/shorten"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "urlshortener2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
